data.lyric:
[ti:The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You) (1993 Digital Remaster)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:The Complete Capitol Recordings Of The Nat King Cole Trio]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Christmas Song(Merry Christmas To You) (Remastered 1999) - Nat King Cole
[00:10.59]Chestnuts roasting on an open fire
[00:16.09]
[00:17.88]Jack frost nipping at your nose
[00:22.38]
[00:25.09]Yuletide carols being sung by a choir
[00:29.99]
[00:32.10]Folks dressed up like Eskimos
[00:36.62]
[00:37.42]Everybody knows a turkey and some mistletoe
[00:45.14]
[00:47.29]Help to make the season bright
[00:51.60]
[00:54.37]Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow
[00:59.69]
[01:00.40]Will find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:06.41]
[01:07.79]They know that Santa's on his way
[01:13.68]
[01:14.93]He's loaded lots of toys and goodies on his sleigh
[01:20.90]
[01:22.29]And every mother's child is gonna spy
[01:28.51]
[01:29.53]To see if reindeer really know how to fly
[01:35.71]
[01:36.88]And so we're offering this simple phrase
[01:44.15]
[01:45.88]To kids from one to ninety two
[01:51.26]
[01:53.06]Although it's been said many times
[01:57.28]Many ways merry Christmas to you
[02:07.50]
[02:35.31]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[02:43.41]
[02:45.13]To kids from one to ninety two
[02:50.98]
[02:52.68]Although it's been said many times
[02:56.67]Many ways merry Christmas to you
data.trans:
[ti:The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You) (1993 Digital Remaster)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:The Complete Capitol Recordings Of The Nat King Cole Trio]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.59]在大火上烘烤栗子
[00:16.09]
[00:17.88]严寒侵袭着你的鼻子
[00:22.38]
[00:25.09]合唱团高唱着圣诞颂歌
[00:29.99]
[00:32.10]大家打扮得就像爱斯基摩人
[00:36.62]
[00:37.42]每个人都知道一只火鸡 一些槲寄生
[00:45.14]
[00:47.29]为这个季节增添色彩
[00:51.60]
[00:54.37]孩子们眼睛发红 
[00:59.69]
[01:00.40]我们会发现今夜难以入睡
[01:06.41]
[01:07.79]他们知道圣诞老人已经在路上
[01:13.68]
[01:14.93]他在他的雪橇上装大量的玩具和许多好吃的
[01:20.90]
[01:22.29]每个孩子准备去偷看
[01:28.51]
[01:29.53]去看驯鹿到底怎么飞
[01:35.71]
[01:36.88]所以请允许我说出这简单的话语
[01:44.15]
[01:45.88]给所有的孩子们
[01:51.26]
[01:53.06]也许已经说了很多次
[01:57.28]祝你圣诞快乐
[02:07.50]
[02:35.31]所以请允许我说出这简单的话语
[02:43.41]
[02:45.13]给所有的孩子们
[02:50.98]
[02:52.68]也许已经说了很多次
[02:56.67]祝你圣诞快乐
